mapper.insert: insert t_store (store_uuid,product_log_uuid, product_log_name, product_log_quantity, product_log_unit, product_log_price,product_log_type) values (#{storeUuid}, #{productLogUuid}, #{productLogName}, #{productLogQuantity}, #{productLogUnit}, #{productLogPrice},#{productLogType});
mapper.select: select where store_uuid=#{storeUuid} order by create_time desc limit #{currentPage}, 20
select where store_uuid=#{storeUuid} and product_log_uuid=#{productLogUuid} order by create_time desc limit #{currentPage}, 20
select where store_uuid=#{storeUuid} and product_log_name like concat('%',#{productLogName},'%') order by create_time desc limit #{currentPage}, 20
